channel.title: Destiny Clan Warfare - Band together, Guardians
channel.description: Wage war against other clans in Destiny 2 and battle your way to the top of the Destiny 2 clan leaderboard

item.title: Mayhem - Next event
item.description: Go and play with those tweaked supers and earn points!

item.title: To the Mountaintop! - Past event
item.description: It’s a race to the mountaintop! The Elder Scrotes invite you to show off your Sherpa skills in Guided Games. -- Any raid or raid lair will count and if you do it as a guided game, earn triple points. This is a clan sponsored event.
item.content:encoded: Past event: http://localhost:9000/events/52/ - It’s a race to the mountaintop! The Elder Scrotes invite you to show off your Sherpa skills in Guided Games. -- Any raid or raid lair will count and if you do it as a guided game, earn triple points. This is a clan sponsored event.

item.title: Prestige Spire of Stars - Past event
item.description: Celebrate the launch of Spire of Stars Prestige raid with a 24 hour event, awarding those going for their first completions. Only completed prestigate Spire counts and there is no hidden raid timer mechanic.

item.title: Destiny HamWarfare - Past event
item.description:
Its time to "go ham or go home" and take on the DestinyRaiders in their own event...MayHam!
Strikes are the name of the game and MayHam is the aim, with super & heavy kills encouraged!

This is a DestinyRaiders sponsored event.
item.content:encoded:
Past event: http://localhost:9000/events/36/ - Its time to "go ham or go home" and take on the DestinyRaiders in their own event...MayHam!
Strikes are the name of the game and MayHam is the aim, with super & heavy kills encouraged!

This is a DestinyRaiders sponsored event.
